steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Check that length of courses equals to 1
Check that 'title' equals to 'Head full cultural sister just news.'

Check that 'description' equals to 'Base leg sister imagine his.
Address value bed she exist together. Especially special middle after western hand personal.'
